title: Nigeria's University College
creator_credit: Lionel Snazelle and Nigerian Film Unit
brief_description: This film follows the various stages in the building of the University College at Ibadan, in Nigeria, designed by Jane drew and Maxwell Fry, The British architects, who supervised the work on the spot.
